attributes.action: Life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness equality Fairness And Equal Rights For All  Uk Nationals In The Uk Visa Process
attributes.additional_details:
I Would Like A Real Seriouse Change In The Law Regarding Uk Visa For People On Low Incomes  And Those Out Of Work To Have The Same Rights  To Apply 4 Uk Visa.s
As Everyones substantiating Circumstances Should Be Taken Into Real  Consideration  When Applying  For A Uk Visa
And To  Declare Sign A Affirmation Statements An Declaration Of The Rights To A Visa  On The Grounds Of A Relationship  Has Been  Existing  And Can Supply Supporting Proof Evidence To Meet Uk Visa Requirements  And That  That She Or He Will Be Looking For Employment For A Income And Not Support From The State To Come Over And Live And Reside In The Uk With There Boyfriends  Girlfriends Fiancee  Fiance Or Husband
And No More Decriminaton But Fairness And Equality To Us All
